data.text: @DrewOlsonShow I love that all of my 4 kids are school age now and they make gifts there. Less work and stress for me to create last minute.

@DrewOlsonShow @DrewOlsonMKE Because I’m toast?....Why didn’t you just ask do you wear the pants or her? 
Much more respect for a man who says “Yes, she’s the mother of my children....
@DrewOlsonShow No she’s not my mom. Might explain why I am separated...
@DrewOlsonShow You better or your batteries better being charged up in your blowup doll because that’s what you’re going to be using for a week if you don’t get her something
@DrewOlsonShow @DrewOlsonMKE My son is 1.  No option here.  I'm buying the gift until he's able to himself.
@DrewOlsonShow My wife might not be my mom, but I have funded my son's mother's day gifts up until they turn 18 or 19 and moved away to college.
@DrewOlsonShow I feel like I know why there are so many divorces now... jk
@DrewOlsonShow Voted, no not obligated. Yet, will still get the Mrs something or go somewhere to celebrate or the boy and/or I would likely be toast. So BOTH really!
